snippet: Lindsey Vonn will head back to the United States for an unexpected break in the middle of the World Cup ski season and may not return to Europe until January.
abstract: Lindsey Vonn will head back to United States for unexpected break in middle of World Cup ski season, citing need to recover from intestinal illness.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn will head back to the United States for an unexpected break in the middle of the World Cup ski season and may not return to Europe until January.
